about.title: Hello
bio: I am a Sr. developer. blockchain, AR, VR and 3D enthusiast. I enjoy experimenting with multimedia using the new stuffs and applying the old ones differently. I try to include a new framework or libraries in my projects. Code in any context interacting with anything.

I am a Sr. Designer. I design intuitive and functional User interfaces. I do illustrations mixing Illustrator, Photoshop and hand drawing. I like to create textures when fits the projects style. I like vector drawing for responsive UIs and svg animations.

I also do management. I am good at transforming Word documents in a well structured good looking app/web/thing that is easy to use. I visualize style, animations and code structure from a briefing. I can write a proposal and present it to final client. I am good at coordinating teams and communicating with different departments and final clients. I write technical documents.

contact.title: Want to know more?
introText: If you hava a project and think iI can give you a hand, you are a great agency and think I can fit in as a team member or just would like to get in touch, please drop me a line:
